channel.title: 3D Artist Position 2017!
channel.description:
Hey community!
We are again looking for a 3D artist to help us finish Xen. We need someone who can create assets, as well as place assets to art our levels.
-Must Have a lot of Time to Commit to the Project -Must Use 3D Studio Max -Able to Create 3D models and Textures Quickly and Efficiently -Must Have Knowledge of Source Compile Tools -Online Portfolio -Ability to Properly Communicate and Work Well in a Team -Organic Modeling is a [b]Huge Plus[/b]
If we like your resume and portfolio we'll send you an art test.
[b]Send applications to [email=jobs@blackmesasource.com]jobs@blackmesasource.com[/email][/b]
Feel free to ask any questions below.

item.title: 3D Artist Position 2017!
item.dc:creator: AsG_Alligator
item.description:
So this position is for 3D asset creation and level artpassing?

I know Max and Source pretty good, but I have not done much organic stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: 3D Artist Position 2017!
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Is it alright if my primary tool isn’t max, but I can still integrate with it?

item.title: 3D Artist Position 2017!
item.dc:creator: Adam-Bomb
item.description:
Hey community!

We are again looking for a 3D artist to help us finish Xen. We need someone who can create assets, as well as place assets to art our levels.

-Must Have a lot of Time to Commit to the Project
-Must Use 3D Studio Max
-Able to Create 3D models and Textures Quickly and Efficiently
-Must Have Knowledge of Source Compile Tools
-Online Portfolio
-Ability to Properly Communicate and Work Well in a Team
-Organic Modeling is a Huge Plus

If we like your resume and portfolio we’ll send you an art test.

Send applications to jobs@blackmesasource.com

Feel free to ask any questions below.

Read full topic
